attributes.action: Tory government is totally failed to keep there promise on NHS
attributes.additional_details: Patient are waiting in A&E for hours and hours to be seen. Tory government have cut down on Doctors and Nurses. Tory government have promised to spend more money on NHS. But they have broken their promise. We can't trust Tory government. Tory government are planning to make NHS private.we want to stop Tory government to make it private. NHS must stay free
attributes.background: Tory government has been failed to keep there promises on NHS. People are waiting for there care. Hospital are full. Patient are waiting in A&E for 6 to 8 hours to be seen.we can't trust Tory government on the NHS. Tory government are totally failures. Tory Health minister and secretary must resign.

rejection.details: The resignation of an individual Minister is not a decision for the Government or Parliament as a whole. You might like to sign this petition, which is very similar to yours: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/177282
